synthesis_conditions.additional_information: The co-precipitation yields and solubilities of α•K•Br at different temperatures were obtained indirectly by analyzing the concentrations of [AuBr4]− ions remaining in the filtrates with UV-Vis spectrophotometry based on the absorbance of [AuBr4]− at λmax = ~380 nm.

synthesis_conditions.yield: 32% for 1:1 mixture, average 80% for 1:2, 1:3, 1:4, and 1:5 mixtures
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: The co-precipitation yields of α•K•Br were obtained indirectly by analyzing the concentrations of [AuBr4]− remaining in the filtrates with UV-Vis spectrophotometry based on the absorbance of [AuBr4]− at λmax = ~380 nm.
